## Setup

### Dependencies

```{r}

library(readr)
library(tidyr)
library(ggplot2)
library(plyr)
library(reshape2)
library(cowplot)
library(tidyverse)
library(dplyr)


source("https://gist.githubusercontent.com/benmarwick/2a1bb0133ff568cbe28d/raw/fb53bd97121f7f9ce947837ef1a4c65a73bffb3f/geom_flat_violin.R")


```

### Load Data

```{r}
sol_100_log <- "../Raw/100_Or_Less/median__COHORT_LEX__violin__gens.csv"
sol_300_log <- "../Raw/300_Or_Less/median__COHORT_LEX__violin__gens.csv"
sol_half_log <- "../Raw/HalfLife/median__COHORT_LEX__violin__gens.csv"
sol_full_log <- "../Raw/FullLife/median__COHORT_LEX__violin__gens.csv"

```

```{r}
sol_100 <- read.csv(sol_100_log, na.strings = "NONE")
sol_300 <- read.csv(sol_300_log, na.strings = "NONE")
sol_half <- read.csv(sol_half_log, na.strings = "NONE")
sol_full <- read.csv(sol_full_log, na.strings = "NONE")

```
## Analysis

Count of solutions found per problem (30 replicates each)

```{r}
ggplot(sol_100, mapping=aes(x=dims, y=gens, fill=dims, colour=dims, scale_x_log10(gens))) +
    geom_flat_violin(position=position_nudge(x=.2, y=0), adjust=2) +
    geom_point(position = position_jitter(width = .15), size = .25) +
    geom_boxplot(aes(x = dims, y = gens),outlier.shape = NA, alpha = 0.3, width = .1, colour = "BLACK") +
    ylab("Generation Found") + ylim(0, 100) + xlab("Dimension") + coord_flip() + guides(fill=FALSE, colour=FALSE) +
  scale_x_discrete(limits = c("cn1_cs512", "cn2_cs256", "cn4_cs128", "cn8_cs64", "cn16_cs32", "cn32_cs16", "cn64_cs8", "cn128_cs4", "cn256_cs2")) +
    ggtitle("Generation solutions found up to 100 Generations") +
    ggsave("../Figs/Generations/SolutionCount/100_Or_Less/Violin/median__violin_gen_100.png", height=15, width=17)

ggplot(sol_300, mapping=aes(x=dims, y=gens, fill=dims, colour=dims)) +
    geom_flat_violin(position=position_nudge(x=.2, y=0), adjust=2) +
    geom_point(position = position_jitter(width = .15), size = .25) +
    geom_boxplot(aes(x = dims, y = gens),outlier.shape = NA, alpha = 0.3, width = .1, colour = "BLACK") +
    ylab("Generation Found") + ylim(0, 300) + xlab("Dimension") + coord_flip() + guides(fill=FALSE, colour=FALSE) +
  scale_x_discrete(limits = c("cn1_cs512", "cn2_cs256", "cn4_cs128", "cn8_cs64", "cn16_cs32", "cn32_cs16", "cn64_cs8", "cn128_cs4", "cn256_cs2")) +
    ggtitle("Generation solutions found up to 300 Generations") +
    ggsave("../Figs/Generations/SolutionCount/300_Or_Less/Violin/median__violin_gen_300.png", height=15, width=10)

ggplot(sol_half, mapping=aes(x=dims, y=gens, fill=dims, colour=dims)) +
    geom_flat_violin(position=position_nudge(x=.2, y=0), adjust=2) +
    geom_point(position = position_jitter(width = .15), size = .25) +
    geom_boxplot(aes(x = dims, y = gens),outlier.shape = NA, alpha = 0.3, width = .1, colour = "BLACK") +
    ylab("Generation Found") + ylim(0, 500) + xlab("Dimension") + coord_flip() + guides(fill=FALSE, colour=FALSE) +
  scale_x_discrete(limits = c("cn1_cs512", "cn2_cs256", "cn4_cs128", "cn8_cs64", "cn16_cs32", "cn32_cs16", "cn64_cs8", "cn128_cs4", "cn256_cs2")) +
    ggtitle("Generation solutions found up to 500 Generations") +
    ggsave("../Figs/Generations/SolutionCount/HalfLife/Violin/median__violin_gen_half.png", height=15, width=10)

ggplot(sol_full, mapping=aes(x=dims, y=gens, fill=dims, colour=dims)) +
    geom_flat_violin(position=position_nudge(x=.2, y=0), adjust=2) +
    geom_point(position = position_jitter(width = .15), size = .25) +
    geom_boxplot(aes(x = dims, y = gens),outlier.shape = NA, alpha = 0.3, width = .1, colour = "BLACK") +
    ylab("Generation Found") + ylim(0, 1000) + xlab("Dimension") + coord_flip() + guides(fill=FALSE, colour=FALSE) +
  scale_x_discrete(limits = c("cn1_cs512", "cn2_cs256", "cn4_cs128", "cn8_cs64", "cn16_cs32", "cn32_cs16", "cn64_cs8", "cn128_cs4", "cn256_cs2")) +
    ggtitle("Generation solutions found up to 0 Generations") +
    ggsave("../Figs/Generations/SolutionCount/FullLife/Violin/median__violin_gen_full.png", height=15, width=10)

```
